fn.p: Edited by: Gabriel Sandblom, Karolinska Institutet (KI), Sweden
Reviewed by: José A. Pereira, CEXS - Universidad Pompeu Fabra (UPF) - Parque de Investigación Biomédica de Barcelona (PRBB), Spain; Jose Diaz, University of Maryland Medical Center, United States
This article was submitted to Visceral Surgery, a section of the journal Frontiers in Surgery
